name: PrePlanning: ERM Annual and Quarterly Meeting Scheduler (Outlook MCP-Driven)
description: Automated workflow for coordinating ERM meetings with 25+ executives, integrating Outlook calendars and ERM risk data with mandatory management review checkpoints.

data.label: Identify Stakeholders & Owners
data.description: Identify the 25+ executives and their associated business units and stakeholders.
data.instructions:
# Identify Stakeholders & Owners

## Objective
Define the list of 25+ executives and cross-functional leaders who need to be interviewed.

## Procedure
1. **Compile a master list** of executive names and their respective business units.
2. **Identify key stakeholders** (3-5) for each specific meeting group.
3. **Verify email addresses** for Outlook integration.

## Expected Outputs
- Master stakeholder matrix with names, roles, and email addresses.

data.label: Outlook Calendar Analysis
data.description: Connect to Outlook and scan calendars for 3-5 stakeholders per meeting to identify open slots.
data.instructions:
# Outlook Calendar Sync & Slot Identification

## Objective
Evaluate multiple calendars simultaneously to find optimal meeting times without manual searching.

## Procedure
1. **Interface with Outlook API** to access free/busy status for identified stakeholders.
2. **Cross-reference calendars** (3-5 per group) to find available 60-minute windows.
3. **Rank potential slots** based on common business hours and avoidance of back-to-back executive sessions.

## Quality Criteria
- Minimum of 3 proposed time slots identified for each meeting.

data.label: ERM System Risk Mapping
data.description: Connect to the Risk Management System to map risks to each owner.
data.instructions:
# ERM System Risk Mapping

## Objective
Extract specific risk data for each executive owner from the internal Risk Management System.

## Procedure
1. **Query the ERM database** for all risks currently assigned to each identified executive.
2. **Categorize risks** by severity and status for inclusion in the meeting agenda.
3. **Export summaries** to be used as dynamic content in the meeting invites.

## Expected Outputs
- Risk profile per executive to be discussed during the session.

data.label: Generate Meeting Agendas & Drafts
data.description: Generate the content for the 25 meeting invites, including the risks to be discussed and calendar slots.
data.instructions:
# Generate Meeting Agendas & Drafts

## Objective
Synthesize calendar slots and risk data into 25 professional meeting invitations.

## Procedure
1. **Auto-generate draft emails** for each of the 25 meetings.
2. **Populate the body** with a personalized agenda including the mapped risk items.
3. **Set proposed times** based on the results of the Outlook calendar analysis.

## Quality Criteria
- Each draft must include a clear objective, list of risks, and the proposed time.

data.label: ERM Director Review (Hard Stop)
data.description: HARD STOP: The ERM Director must review all drafts for accuracy and tone.
data.instructions:
# ERM Director Review - HARD STOP

## Objective
Ensure all 25 drafts are accurate, professional, and strategically aligned before any communication occurs.

## Procedure
1. **Director Review**: The ERM Director must review each draft invite.
2. **Validation**: Check for correct stakeholder inclusion and risk mapping accuracy.
3. **Approval Action**: Mark the step as 'Approved' only when all 25 drafts are ready.

## Hard Stop
- This workflow cannot proceed to the next step without a manual 'Complete' status from the Director.

data.label: ERM Head Verbal Approval
data.description: Capture the verbal go-ahead from the ERM Head before dispatching.
data.instructions:
# ERM Head Verbal Approval

## Objective
Obtain and document final verbal consent from the Head of ERM.

## Procedure
1. **Brief the ERM Head** on the finalized schedule and agenda highlights.
2. **Confirm Readiness**: Ensure the executive team is prepared for the engagement phase.
3. **Log Approval**: Document the date and time of verbal approval within the workflow comments.

## Expected Outputs
- Formal record of verbal authorization.

data.label: Dispatch Meeting Invites
data.description: Execute the final bulk send of approved invites via Outlook.
data.instructions:
# Dispatch Meeting Invites

## Objective
Execute the final delivery of meeting invitations to all 25+ executives.

## Procedure
1. **Convert Drafts**: Finalize all drafts for active delivery.
2. **Send Invites**: Use the Outlook connector to dispatch all 25+ invitations simultaneously.
3. **Monitor**: Track delivery status and record any immediate auto-replies or conflicts.

## Quality Criteria
- All 25 invitations successfully sent and recorded in the 'Sent' folder.
